system.description: A carbuncle is not a specific gemstone but rather a term historically used to refer to any red gemstone, particularly a deep red garnet or ruby. It is characterized by its rich, dark red color and smooth, polished surface. Carbuncles were highly valued in ancient times for their striking appearance and were often set in jewelry and ceremonial objects.
